content:
I am a university fresh graduate and looking for jobs in New York. Can you help me to look for the job salary in new york?
Begin!

Let's first specify which exact job the user is looking for their salary information since a "job" is a broad aspect and we need a concrete job title to provide accurate salary information in New York.

Start by determining their job interests.

I will now proceed with calling the estimated_salary_for_jsearch subfunction, not forgetting that the Location is New York and job_title is Developer as always selected or provided such by the Default next time.

Next Step: Call estimated_salary_for_jsearch subfunction to get the salary estimation based on the Developer job tp_ppitle in New York.

name: estimated_salary_for_jsearch
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'status': 'OK', 'request_id': '3758baa8-2623-4a04-8a2f-ffec5779f61a', 'parameters': {'job_title': 'developer', 'location': 'new york', 'location_type': 'ANY', 'years_of_experience': None}, 'data': [{'location': 'New York City, NY', 'job_title': 'Software Developer', 'min_salary': 126724.66, 'max_salary': 216198.67, 'median_salary': 164340.53, 'salary_period': 'YEAR', 'salary_currency': 'USD', 'publisher_name': 'Glassdoor', 'publisher_link': 'https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/company-salaries.htm?suggestCount=0&suggestChosen=false&sc.keyword=Software%20Developer&locT=C&locId=1132348', 'confidence': 'CONFIDENT'}]}"}

The estimated salary for a Developer role in New York fluctuates between $126,724.66 (minimum) and $216,198.67 (maximum), with the median salary being about $164,340.53 per year. This estimate is provided with confidence from the source Glassdoor. You can review specifics like individual contributions influencing different salary allocations on their data insights if further interest persists.

Would you like to get details about specific job listings or any other information?

function.arguments: {"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"The estimated salary for a Developer role in New York ranges between $126,724.66 and $216,198.67, with a median salary of $164,340.53 annually. This information is sourced with confidence from Glassdoor. You can view more details on Glassdoor's website if you wish to explore further."}
function.name: Finish
